item.title: I-80 East - Exit 15
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue east on I-80 for Elko.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 36A and 36B
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exits 36A and 36B. Exit 36A - I-80 East/Sparks/Elko. Exit 36B - I-80 West/Reno/Sacramento (California). US-395 continues north towards Susanville (California). I-580 ends at I-80. The freeway continues as US-395.

item.description: I-1580 North/US-395 north at Exit 33 - Plumb Lane/Villanova Drive. Approaching Exit 34 - Mill St. Use Plumb Lane for the Reno-Tahoe International Airport.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North Approaching Exit 33
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exit 33 - Plumb Lane/Villanova Drive. A distance marker showing the next three Reno exits is on the left side of the picture. The next three exits are: Plumb Lane, Mill St., and E. Second St. Use the Plumb Lane exit for the Reno-Tahoe International Airport.

item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 16 - Old US 395. Use Exit 16 for Alt. US-395.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 10
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 10 - Eastlake Blvd. This is the southern terminus of Alt. US-395. Alt. US-395 was created when the new I-580 freeway was completed. Alt. US-395 follows the old route of US-395 to Reno.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Washoe County Line
item.description: Washoe County Line on I-580/US-395 North.

item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exit 7 - Arrowhead Drive

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 6
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 6 - College Parkway.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 5
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 5 - US-50 East/Dayton/Fallon. Continue north on I-580/US-395 North for Reno. The US-50/US-395 split ends here.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching US-395
item.description: US-50 east approaching I-580/US-395. Turn right for US-395 south for Minden and Gardnerville. Turn left for Bus. US-395/S Carson St. Continue straight for I-580 North/US-395 North/US-50 East/Reno/Fallon. US-50 joins I-580/US-395 north into Carson City.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching I-580/US-395/Bus. US-395
item.description: US-50 East approaching I-580/US-395/Bus. US-395 in Carson City. Use US-395 south for Minden and Gardnerville.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching I-580/US-395
item.description: US-50 East approaching I-580/US-395 in Carson City.

item.title: End I-580 South at US-395/US-50/Bus. US-395
item.description: End I-580 South at US-395/US-50/Bus. US-395 in Carson City. Turn left for Bus. US-395 North/Carson City; right for US-395 South/Minden/Gardnerville. Continue straight for US-50 West/South Lake Tahoe (California).

item.title: End I-580 South at US-50/US-395/Bus. US-395
item.description: End I-580 South at US-50/US-395/Bus. US-395 in Carson City. Use US-395 south for Minden/Gardnerville. Use US-50 West for South Lake Tahoe (California).

item.title: I-580 South Approaching Bus. US-395
item.description: I-580 South Approaching Bus. US-395/Carson Street. I-580 and the freeway ends at Carson St.

item.description: I-580/US-395 South/US-50 West approaching Exit 3 - Fairview Drive.

item.title: US-50 West Approaching I-580/US-395
item.description: US-50 west approaching I-580/US-395. Use I-580/US-395 north for Reno. US-50 west joins I-580/US-395 south for Minden and South Lake Tahoe (CA). Continue on William St. for Downtown Carson City.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp. Use left lane for Carson City Downtown; left lane for US-50 east to Dayton and Fallon.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 39
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 39 - US-50/Dayton/Fallon. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno. The US-50/US-395 split ends here. The I-580 shield is not listed on the overhead.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 38
item.description: I-580 north at Exit 38 - Fairview Drive.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North/US-50 East - Carson City
item.description: First shields on I-580 north in Carson City.

item.title: I-580/US-50/US-395 Freeway Entrance
item.description: I-580 North/US-50 East/US-395 North Freeway Entrance in Carson City. This is the southern beginning of I-580.

item.title: US-395 North at US-50/I-580 - Carson City
item.description: US-395 North at US-50/I-580 in Carson City. Turn left for US-50 West/South Lake Tahoe. Continue straight for Bus. US-395/S. Carson St. Merge right for I-580/US-395 North/US-50 East/Fallon/Reno.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching I-580/US-50
item.description: US-395 North approaching I-580/US-50 in Carson City. Merge right for I-580/US-395 North/US-50 East/Fallon/Reno. I-580 begins here at the US-50/US-395 junction.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching US-50 and I-580
item.description: US-395 North approaching US-50 and I-580 in Carson City.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp. Use left lane for Carson City Downtown; left lane for US-50 east to Dayton and Fallon.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 68A and 68B
item.description: I-580/US-395 north at Exits 68A and 68B. Exit 68A - I-80 East/Sparks/Elko. Exit 68B - I-80 West/Reno/Sacramento (California). US-395 continues north towards Susanville (California). This is the north end of I-580.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exits 68A and 68B
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exits 68A and 68B. Exit 68A - I-80 East/Sparks/Elko. Exit 68B - I-80 West/Reno/Sacramento (California). US-395 continues north towards Susanville (California). I-580 ends at I-80. The freeway continues as US-395.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North Approaching Exits 68AB and 69
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exit 68A - I-80 East; Exit 68B - I-80 West, and Exit 69 (exit number not shown) - Oddie Blvd.

item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 41 - College Parkway.

item.title: US-395 North - Exit 39
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 39 - US-50/Dayton/Fallon. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno. The US-50/US-395 split ends here. I-580 begins here northbound, although it is not listed on the overhead. The first I-580 shield is north of this interchange.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 15
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue east on I-80 for Elko.

item.description: Next 3 Reno/Sparks exits on I-80 East: Wells Ave., I-580/US-395, Prater Way.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 15
item.description: Connection from I-80 west to I-580/US-395. Use the right lane for US-395 north to Susanville (California). Use left lane for I-580/US-395 south to Carson City.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 15
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue on I-80 west for Sacramento (California).

item.title: I-80 West - Exits 16 and 15
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 16 - Prater Way/E. 4th St. Approaching Exit 15 - I-580/US-395/Carson City/Susanville (California). Continue west on I-80 towards Sacramento (California).

item.description: Distance marker for next three Sparks/Reno area exits on I-80 west. Distance to Prater Way, US-395/I-580, Wells Ave.

item.description: Distance marker for next three Sparks/Reno exits on I-80 west: Rock Blvd., Prater Way, and US-395/I-580.
